remarks: Product of two divisor sums.  (This is also the main part of the proof that " ` sum_ k || N F ( k ) ` is a multiplicative function if ` F ` is".)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)
statement:
dvdsmulf1o.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
dvdsmulf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dvdsmulf1o.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( M gcd N ) = 1 ) $.
dvdsmulf1o.x $e |- X = { x e. NN | x || M } $.
dvdsmulf1o.y $e |- Y = { x e. NN | x || N } $.
dvdsmulf1o.z $e |- Z = { x e. NN | x || ( M x. N ) } $.
fsumdvdsmul.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fsumdvdsmul.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Y ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumdvdsmul.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. X /\ k e. Y ) ) -> ( A x. B ) = D ) $.
fsumdvdsmul.7 $e |- ( i = ( j x. k ) -> C = D ) $.
fsumdvdsmul $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ j e. X A x. sum_ k e. Y B ) = sum_ i e. Z C ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B j $.
$d C j k $.
$d D i $.
$d M x $.
$d N x $.
$d X i j k $.
$d Y i j k $.
$d Z i j $.
$d i j k ph $.
$d i j k x $.
